caption: A classic rock power ballad with soaring electric guitar, thunderous drums, and emotional male vocals. Features a quiet verse building to an explosive chorus with layered harmonies and an iconic guitar solo.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Standing at the crossroads of my life
Looking back at all the sacrifice
Every battle every war
Wondering what it was all for

[Verse 2]
The road was long and full of pain
Sunshine always follows rain
I've been knocked down time and again
But I always rise my friend

[Chorus]
I will stand unbroken
Every word I've spoken
Led me to this moment here
I will stand unbroken
With my heart wide open
I have conquered all my fear

[Verse 3]
To everyone who said I'd fail
Your doubt became my holy grail
Fueled the fire in my soul
Now I've finally reached my goal

[Chorus]
I will stand unbroken
Every word I've spoken
Led me to this moment here

[Guitar Solo]

[Final Chorus]
I will stand unbroken
I have conquered all my fear
Unbroken

[Outro]
